detaileddescription.para: Callback called during upload or download of a file from server It is just forwarding the call and some parameters to the vtable defined callback

memberdef.argsstring: (belle_sip_user_body_handler_t *bh, belle_sip_message_t *msg, void *data, size_t offset, uint8_t *buffer, size_t *size)
memberdef.name: linphone_chat_message_file_transfer_on_send_body

detaileddescription.para: Callback called when posting a file to server (following rcs5.1 recommendation)

parameterdescription.para: the user data associated to the handler, contains the linphoneChatMessage we're working on
current position in the input buffer
the ouput buffer we to copy the data to be uploaded
size in byte of the data requested, as output it will contain the effective copied size

detaileddescription.para: Callback function called when we have a response from server during a file upload to server (rcs5.1 recommandation) Note: The first post is empty and the server shall reply a 204 (No content) message, this will trigger a new post request to the server to upoad the file. The server response to this second post is processed by this same function

parameterdescription.para: the user define pointer associated with the request, it contains the linphoneChatMessage we're trying to send

detaileddescription.para: Destroys a LinphoneChatMessage.

detaileddescription.para:
Create a message attached to a dedicated chat room;
cr
the chat room.
message
text message, NULL if absent.
external_body_url
the URL given in external body or NULL.
state
the LinphoneChatMessage.State of the message.
time
the time_t at which the message has been received/sent.
is_read
TRUE if the message should be flagged as read, FALSE otherwise.
is_incoming
TRUE if the message has been received, FALSE otherwise.
a new LinphoneChatMessage

Send a message to peer member of this chat room.
cr
LinphoneChatRoom object
msg
LinphoneChatMessage message to be sent
status_cb
LinphoneChatMessageStateChangeCb status callback invoked when message is delivered or could not be delivered. May be NULL
ud
user data for the status cb.
Deprecated
Use linphone_chat_room_send_chat_message() instead.
The LinphoneChatMessage must not be destroyed until the the callback is called.

Send a message to peer member of this chat room.
cr
LinphoneChatRoom object
msg
LinphoneChatMessage object The state of the message sending will be notified via the callbacks defined in the LinphoneChatMessageCbs object that can be obtained by calling linphone_chat_message_get_callbacks().
